Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2007 01:39PM halika wrote: I just had my yearly transvaginal ultrasound and my results are uterus thickening as well. My gyn said last year my number was 3 and now it's 11. She said 4 is the normal number. I am scheduled for a D&c and hysteroscopy (sp) this coming Wednedsay. Wishing you good results on your biopsy.
